name: Gun Crazy
overview: Gun Crazy is a fast paced and hectic arcade style action shoot em’ up in this homage to classic old school classics! Become the fiercest lady on the police force! Take out the bad guys through 4 unique levels filled with challenging bosses and powerful special guns. Features: * Survive 4 uniquely designed levels * Fight bosses, each with their own challenges * Pick up special guns that will lead you to victory * Tight controls allow for easy use to take down your enemies
